response.explain: The previous action code has successfully executed the subtask of taking out the potato from the fridge. The potato is now in the robot's inventory. The next step is to cook the potato.
response.subtask:
(1) Move to the fridge
(2) Open the fridge
(3) Take out the potato
(4) Cook the potato
(5) Move to the bottom cabinet
(6) Open the bottom cabinet
(7) Take out the platter
(8) Put the cooked potato on the platter
(9) Move to the breakfast table
(10) Serve the platter with the cooked potato on the breakfast table
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 4: Cook the potato
    potato = registry(env,"potato_89")
    cook(robot, potato)
    donothing(env)
